63.eng-name: Merits of the Helpers in Madinah (Ansaar)

hadiths.text: Narrated Al-Bara:A silken cloth was given as a present to the Prophet (ﷺ) . His companions started touching it and admiring its softness. The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "Are you admiring its softness? The handkerchiefs of Sa`d bin Mu`adh (in Paradise) are better and softer than it

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنَاقِبُ سَعْدِ بْنِ مُعَاذٍ رضى الله عنه
chapter.eng-name: The merits of Sa'd bin Mu’adh رضي الله عنه
